attributes.action: Pneumococcal  vaccine to inform those entitled of the benefits
attributes.additional_details: many people entitled to the pneumonia jag are not informed of their right to this important life saver and how it can prevent Sepsis and Meningitis. Millions are not aware of its benefits . I want the U K public to all be informed of what benefits  immunisation can protect you from. Also I make no claims about giving any form of protection to Corona virus but I have been assured elderly and people with weak immune systems will have a better chance of survival than those who have not been vaccinated or worse still not informed
attributes.background: To make it compulsory to inform every one aged over 65 and under 65 s that have underlying health issues of their free entitlement. My young brother paid £80 for it last week as he is 64.

rejection.details:
We've tried to get in touch with you to talk about your petition but we didn't hear back. 

You can get in touch with us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk if you'd like to resubmit your petition and want to talk about the contents first.
